name: Pbxmusicbot
description: a telegram music bot for voice chats, crafted by badmunda with python, pyrogram, and pytgcalls

BOT_NAME.description: bot name for thumbnail display (use plain text only)

LOGGER_ID.description: channel or group id for logging messages

PBXBOT_SESSION.description: pyrogram session string for pbx music bot

HEROKU_API.description: reveal api key from heroku dashboard for updates

HEROKU_APP.description: app name from heroku for updater functionality

COOKIES_URL.description: link to cookies file, if needed

USE_API.description: enable api streaming with true, disable with false

USE_COOKIES.description: use cookies.txt for streaming if true

UPSTREAM_BRANCH.description: git branch for updates (e.g., main or master)
